notes: Implementation of Świdziński's formal grammar of Polish. Requires a parser (Birnam parser available as a separate tool) and a morphological analyser (no free analyser for Polish; Morfeusz can be used with restrictions - in this case the whole set is available for academic and non-commercial use only).
title: Świgra
